title: Lemon and almond cake
description: This moist lemon cake with its sugary crust is so good it won't last long. Make one extra and freeze (un-iced) for another day.
ingredients: 200g/7oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
50g/2oz plain flour or white spelt flour
2 lemons (juice of 1 and finely grated zest of 2)
